text: In the style of STABILO_BOSS A yellow highlighter with a black cap, featuring the brand logo and text in bold black lettering.
In the style of STABILO_BOSS A black highlighter with the cap removed, showing the chisel tip. The highlighter has white text and logo on its body.
In the style of STABILO_BOSS A set of six highlighters in various colors (blue, green, orange, pink, purple, and yellow), with one highlighter showing the chisel tip.

In the style of STABILO_BOSS A light blue highlighter and two point 88 pens (one orange and one turquoise) placed on a patterned notebook, with a turquoise book and desk accessories in the background.

In the style of STABILO_BOSS A hand with pastel-colored nails holding a purple highlighter, surrounded by several other highlighters in various colors (pink, yellow, orange, turquoise, and light green) on a white surface.

In the style of STABILO_BOSS A cluttered workspace featuring open notebooks filled with handwritten notes, a croissant, and two highlighters (one green and one yellow) lying on top of the notes, alongside a blue and orange pen.

In the style of STABILO_BOSS A corkboard with a note that says 'DON'T FORGET TO smile, kiss, be happy,' surrounded by several highlighters in various colors (peach, green, pink, blue, and purple) with their caps partially off, along with other desk accessories.
In the style of STABILO_BOSS A peach-colored highlighter with a black cap, featuring the brand's logo and text in bold black lettering.

In the style of STABILO_BOSS Two white mugs with heart designs, each filled with various highlighters in pastel colors (green, pink, blue, purple, orange, yellow), with two highlighters (purple and pink) lying on a white wooden surface surrounded by small decorative clips and a pink ribbon.
In the style of STABILO_BOSS A person using a yellow highlighter to mark a fashion illustration, with a green and a purple highlighter, scissors, and fabric materials visible on the table.
